name: Organ harverster
description:
You work for a hospital and your patients are waiting for an organ transplant. Go out in the street and find some potential donors !

You must choose wisely considering the following characteristics :

- Blood group : The donor must be of the same blood group as the patient

- Organ quality : Organs are rated from D (worst) to S (best). The better the organ, the more points you get !

- Age : Try to get a donor with an age as close as possible to the receiver's

- Time : Your time is limited, if you're not quick enough, your patient will die ! If you're fast, you'll get extra points

Once you've located the perfect donor, you must punch them until they're knocked-out. Then you can pick them up and carry them to the hospital. Talk to the NPC to validate the quest. If you're done with all the quests, the level is over !

Good luck and enjoy ! :)

Controls :
ZQSD / WASD: Move
Left mouse button : Punch
Mouse move : Look around
Space : Jump
E : Interact
F : Carry
Left shift : Run
ESC : Pause
